actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the period from February 17 to February 23 as Sertoma Freedom Week, and to call upon the people of the United States and interested groups and organizations to observe such period with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the period from February 17 to February 23 as "Sertoma Freedom Week", and calls upon the people of the United States and interested groups and organizations to observe such period with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the period from February 17 to February 23 as Sertoma Freedom Week, and to call upon the people of the United States and interested groups and organizations to observe such period with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
